title: CraftCommand: Distributed Operations & Bedrock Integration
notes: Feature: Native Minecraft Bedrock Edition (BDS) support with auto-healing and player tracking.
Feature: Introduced 'One-Click Distributed Nodes' with automated Bootstrap ZIP enrollment.
Feature: Global Operations Center (GOC) for cluster-wide telemetry and resource heatmaps.
Feature: Intelligent Scheduler for automatic, metric-based server placement.
Feature: Server Icon customization with branded defaults and real-time previews.
Feature: Embedded Monaco IDE with syntax highlighting and real-time co-presence.
Self-Healing: 'Zombie Adoption' integrated to re-acquire running server processes after restarts.
Hardening: Resolved Protocol Mismatch issues and stabilized Zero-Config HTTPS.
Consolidation: Unified Audit Logs and Schedules into the managed SQL storage system.
UX: Deep Professional UI refresh with glassmorphic aesthetics and documentation hub.
